Reviews.Title: “not really a new hotel but its OK”
Reviews.Author: 540willk
Reviews.Content: mercure advertise hotel st antoine january 2012 renovations limited comparison mercure paris voltaire bastille quartier hotel refurbished offers experience st marketed paname meet standard clean staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for us”
Reviews.Author: JOANNEMC
Reviews.Content: travelled 14 yr son sightseeing getaway trip feb 2012 found hotel relatively easy help gps phone short walk rollin metro station line 8 staff friendly helpful sorted couldnt lovely single beds wall mounted flat screen telly wee table tc facilities modern en suite bathroom lovely toiletries hairdryer wall mounted magnified shaving mirror wardrobe space hangers provided free charge safe perfect passports valuables tastefully decorated double sliding patio type doors shutters thick black curtains perfect lie theres lie reviews plenty luggage walk slightly beyond rollin metro bastille metro line 5 bastille loads loads cafes bars restaurants looks lovely night lit pick map hotel reception walk city lots lots tiring fun booked city segway tour online £70 fantastic laugh loads city fun worth penny recommend italian restaurant short walk 5mins hotel called dell isola rue du faubourg st antoine value money tasty portions friendly staff amazing patisserie street hotel croissants pastries die dont brekkie hotel didnt own course mcdonalds nearby past rollin metro prefer fantastic stay paris lovely warm friendly hotel stay thank recommend friends hope goes positive stay booked online venerecom 250 euros 2 2 nights okay bastille paris

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, very clean, friendly and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: sonja f
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay clean comfortable internet complimentary staff friendly reasonably priced location getting city particularly marais bastille restaurants nearby short walk metro definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for a quick visit”
Reviews.Author: LizAndNZ
Reviews.Content: stayed late september nights heart tourist relatively easy gare de lyon closer metro station party spotlessly clean denying decor refresh especially carpets outweighed reasonable paris standards price helpful friendly staff spoke english rooftop terrace breakfasted morning croissants pain chocolat boulangerie literally minutes enjoyed sundowner hard days sightseeing local market bursting fresh foods adjacent nice supermarket basic supplies lots local restaruants pick evening meals id stay

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location, very friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: tonyusher
Reviews.Content: 12th time paris decided local normally stay left bank rue de bac love little gem hotel wonderful city close de vosges bastille marais paris walked champs elyssees terrace recommended clean functional sitting mornings late evenings delight enjoyed late september indian summer hotel staff efficient friendly recommendation excellent especially restaurant adjacent laneway ate 3 nights touristy found ourselves conversing locals wonderfully friendly hepful breakfast try la chat translates bent cat cat super fresh morning found fresh farmers market 30 metres hotel door anf abundance cafes eateries close theatre main dor catch brilliantly funny parisian hour olivier bringing stand routine melbourne 2012 comedy festival huge hit hilarious 99 english easy understand definitely

Reviews.Title: “Petite Room”
Reviews.Author: Carmen050
Reviews.Content: selected hotel daughter friend near local frequent night location close restaurants bars hotel expected hard walk luggage top chairs night daugher friend stayed channels tv desired 2 news channels english cnn french spanish kept repeating program aware japan situation 247 staff nice little knowledge restaurants recommend hotel staff cant recommend restaurants except street internet slow read emails trip partially business mixed pleasure forget frustrating paris staying hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a perfect location!”
Reviews.Author: EntrepreneurGal
Reviews.Content: wonderful 6 night stay perfect neighbourhood safe clean 15 min stroll bastille metro stop gare du lyon staff friendly personable probably complaint wifi erratic inconvenient location market street definitely return

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in Great Location with Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: pken111
Reviews.Content: paname gem reasonably appointed star incredibly friendly staff breakfasts hippest precincts paris restaurants wine bars street markets paris stayed paname twice found comfortable tiny bigger 3 stars insulated street noise

Reviews.Title: “Great clean hotel for the price, close to the subway”
Reviews.Author: frombgtony
Reviews.Content: stayed le paname december 2011 eve nice helpful demanding guests clean cozy warm winter bathrooms nice bedding towels replaced everyday dont breakfast paris city cafes try creperie close hotel amazing parisian crepes subway ride 4 5 stops louvre 1 goes sights short walk de bastille subway paris wasnt night closest station closed walk de bastille fine cold recommend

Reviews.Title: “Homely”
Reviews.Author: darrypars
Reviews.Content: stayed paname hotel june wife baby daughter nights travel hotel uneventful travelled cab airport sight little unnerving looked wee bit jaded outside reached reservation dear lady reception store bags safely short walk explore neighbourhood location walk bastille seine minute walk subway farmers market opposite street close home clean nice touches including ta huge picture cleanliness mantained 4 days opt breakfast bakeries cheese stores minutes radius sushi french cuisine restaurants nearby service free laptop reception provided web browsing using free wifi time amenity iwas wonderful strike france day departure led booked taxi nth hour gentleman reception personal mission ans relentlessly phones till taxi airport delay 20 minutes nice hotel loved experience litlle pricey

Reviews.Title: “A lovely stay in Paris”
Reviews.Author: sunl0ver78
Reviews.Content: stayed paname hotel 5 nights initially bit apprehensive seeing exterior arriving paris concerns quickly dissipated bright spotless clean tastefully decorated bathroom beautiful clean bed comfortable weve slept own bed home staying 5 nights breakfast included rates 100 euro served smile enjoyable breakfast holiday able borrow laptop reception staff internet real bonus metro 57 mins walk definitely paris hotel real surprise couldnt happier choice definitely visit

HotelInfo.Name: Paname Hotel Bastille
HotelInfo.Address: 64 Rue Crozatier, 75012 Paris, France
